DataElement.preferredName: Hematopoietic Stem Cell Graft Allogenic Source Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)_Healthy skin, bone, or other tissue taken from one part of the body and used to replace diseased or injured tissue removed from another part of the body._Taken from different individuals of the same species.  Also called allogeneic._Where something is available or from where it originates._Indicator of Yes, No, Unknown, Not Done, or Not Applicable to a question.[manually curated]
